articles.description: The two-month hiatus seems like a long time ago as the Telstra Premiership starts to fly by with round six now in the books.
articles.content:
The ageless Morris brothers are two of five Roosters players to win spots in the Team of the Week for Round 6.
After being re-united again this year, Brett and Josh have turned in a series of top-no… [+491 chars]
